locales.plugin_description: Checks if there is a more recent version of UASECO at start-up & MasterAdmin connect.
locales.chat_uptodate: Checks if there is a more recent version of UASECO.
locales.uptodate_ok: {#server}» {#message}This UASECO version {#highlite}{1}{#message} is up to date.
locales.uptodate_failed: {#server}» {#error}Can not check UASECO version, connection was failed!
